Uses of Interface
org.jgrapes.core.Channel

  • Packages that use Channel 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.core  
    org.jgrapes.core.annotation  
    org.jgrapes.core.internal  

    • Uses of Channel in org.jgrapes.core

      Classes in org.jgrapes.core that implement Channel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractComponent
      A convenience base class for new components.
      class  ClassChannel
      The root base class for channels that use their class (type) as key for matching channels with handlers.
      class  NamedChannel
      A class for channels identified by a name (string).
      Fields in org.jgrapes.core declared as Channel 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Channel Channel.BROADCAST
      A special channel that can be used to send events to all components.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.core that return Channel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Channel AbstractComponent.getChannel()
      Returns the channel associated with the component.
      Channel Manager.getChannel()
      Returns the channel if the component managed by this manager.
      Channel[] Event.getChannels()
      Returns the channels associated with the event.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.core with parameters of type Channel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Manager.fire(Event event, Channel... channels)
      Fires the given event on the given channel.
      void Event.setChannels(Channel[] channels)
      Sets the channels that the event is fired on if no channels are specified explicitly when firing the event (see Manager.fire(Event, Channel...)).
      Constructors in org.jgrapes.core with parameters of type Channel 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractComponent(Channel componentChannel)
      Creates a new component base with its channel set to the given channel.

    • Uses of Channel in org.jgrapes.core.annotation

      Classes in org.jgrapes.core.annotation that implement Channel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Handler.NO_CHANNEL
      The default value for the channels parameter of the annotation.
